overview: The Mormon Tabernacle Choir, Orchestra at Temple Square, and Bells on Temple Square join with one of today’s brightest international singing stars, English tenor Alfie Boe, and internationally renowned TV personality Tom Brokaw, to celebrate being home for the holidays. This inspiring concert manifests the message of the Christmas season—that Christ came to earth to bring peace and joy to all people.

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus-Christ of Latter-Day Saints

tagline: Christmas with the Mormon Tabernacle Choir and Orchestra at Temple Square
title: 2012 - Home for the Holidays
